text: "Runaway" is a 1961 debut single from Del Shannon. It is the leading single from debut studio album Runaway with Del Shannon and went to number 1 in the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Chile and Canada and number 2 in Ireland and the Netherlands. It went on to be covered by numerous artists including Bonnie Raitt in 1977. ==References== Category:1961 songs Category:Debut singles Category:R&B; songs Category:Del Shannon songs Category:Bonnie Raitt songs Category:Elvis Presley songs Category:The Beach Boys songs Category:Avenged Sevenfold songs Category:The Sensational Alex Harvey Band songs
title: Runaway (Del Shannon song)
